definition: oracle script/oracle bone inscriptions (an early form of Chinese script)

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
bone
language/culture/writing/formal/literary/gentle/(old) classifier for coins/Kangxi radical 67
surname Wen
oracle script/oracle bone character (an early form of Chinese script)

sentences.english: But these are products that Oracle sells.
sentences.chinese: 但这些都是甲骨文公司销售的产品。

sentences.english: There has been no other contact with Oracle since then.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，我们和甲骨文再没有任何接触。

sentences.english: The original characters are Oracle, popular in the Shang period.
sentences.chinese: 最初的汉字是甲骨文，盛行于殷商时期。

sentences.english: In terms of antitrust, Oracle also seems safe.
sentences.chinese: 在反托拉斯方面甲骨文似乎也是安全的。

sentences.english: He had served as chief technology officer of Oracle's client software group.
sentences.chinese: 高斯林曾担任甲骨文客户软件部的首席技术官。

sentences.english: The question is: what exactly does the cloud mean to Oracle?
sentences.chinese: 问题是，云究竟对于甲骨文公司意味着什么？

sentences.english: Outside the bronze inscription, he also involves Oracle study.
sentences.chinese: 金文之外，孙氏又涉及甲骨文研究。

sentences.english: Oracle and Microsoft were both born in difficult economic times.
sentences.chinese: 甲骨文和微软恰恰就是产生在经济低谷期。

sentences.english: Oracle should be the first to write with a brush, then use the weapon carved.
sentences.chinese: 甲骨文也应该是先用毛笔写出，然后再用利器刻出的。

sentences.english: The symbols inscribed on pottery earlier than the Shang Dynasty bear resemblance to the Shang oracles.
sentences.chinese: 夏商以前的陶纹刻符与商代的甲骨文有相似之处。

sentences.english: But HP and Oracle reaffirmed a commitment to their partnership on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 但是，周一惠普和甲骨文重申他们的伙伴关系。

sentences.english: Simplified Chinese characters from Oracle to the evolutionary history of a continuous and verifiable.
sentences.chinese: 简体字来自于连续可证明的甲骨文的进化史。

sentences.english: Han Jia, I don't think oracle-bone inscriptions are difficult to read at all.
sentences.chinese: 韩佳，我发现这甲骨文一点也不难认。

sentences.english: Oracle does not have a tradition of playing well with others.
sentences.chinese: 甲骨文并没有一个与其他公司和睦相处的传统。

sentences.english: Third, in studying common word meaning of oracle bone inscriptions.
sentences.chinese: 二是甲骨文词目的整理。

definition: inscription in bronze/bell-cauldron inscription
oracle script/oracle bone character (an early form of Chinese script)
tortoise shell and animal bones used in divination/oracle bone inscriptions (an early form of Chinese script)
pictogram/hieroglyph
seal script used throughout the pre-Han period
the great seal/used narrowly for 籀文/used broadly for many pre-Qin scripts
pictogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character derived from a picture/sometimes called hieroglyph
the small or lesser seal, the form of Chinese character standardized by the Qin dynasty
to create Chinese characters/cf Six Methods of forming Chinese characters 六書|六书[liu4 shu1]
seal script as unified by the Qin dynasty/the small seal 小篆 and great seal 大篆
cuneiform (Babylonian script)
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
early form of Chinese characters inscribed in stone, a precursor of the small seal 小篆[xiao3 zhuan4]
Microsoft corporation
bird writing, a calligraphic style based on seal script 篆书, but with characters decorated as birds and insects
Xu Shen (-147) the compiler of the original Han dynasty dictionary Shuowen Jiezi 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]
